title: Quickstart
content: Source: https://docs.ollama.com/quickstart This quickstart will walk your through running your first model with Ollama. To get started, download Ollama on macOS, Windows or Linux. Download Ollama Open a terminal and run the command: Lastly, chat with the model: Start by downloading a model: Then install Ollama's Python library: Lastly, chat with the model: Start by downloading a model: Then install the Ollama JavaScript library: Lastly, chat with the model: See a full list of available models [here](https://ollama.com/models).
